definition: to chant/see 梵唄|梵呗[fan4 bai4]
modal particle indicating indicating lack of enthusiasm/modal particle indicating that things should only or can only be done a certain way
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
cowrie/shellfish/currency (archaic)
surname Bei
chanting of prayers (Buddhism)

sentences.english: Said a little voice. They're jus pants.
sentences.chinese: 脑子里一个细细的声音说道，就一条裤子呗。

sentences.english: Anyway, they were the boats ancient people used.
sentences.chinese: 这个嘛，反正是古代人坐的船呗。

sentences.english: Lily: It's because of the greenhouse effect, and these islands belong to Maldives.
sentences.chinese: 因为温室效应呗，这些岛屿是属于马尔代夫的。

sentences.english: It's because of the greenhouse effect, and these islands belong to Maldives.
sentences.chinese: 因为温室效应呗，这些岛屿是属于马尔代夫的。

sentences.english: Many ancident trees have been seriously destroyed in this big fire.
sentences.chinese: 许多古树在这次大火中呗严重地破坏了。

sentences.english: That means you'll have double happiness.
sentences.chinese: 那就说明你会双喜临门呗。

sentences.english: Move out of town and go somewhere cheaper.
sentences.chinese: 从市区搬走，找个便宜的地方住呗。
保持神秘感呗，给的越少，留给想象的空间就越大。

sentences.english: Say white, be foster sensibilities Bai in advance.
sentences.chinese: 说白了，就是提前培养感情呗。

sentences.english: Just keeping alive, M' Coy said.
The master is too lazy to go up the mountain and he can't see us, so let's eat boldly.
sentences.chinese: 主人懒得上山来，他又看不见，咱们放开肚子吃呗。

sentences.english: At most the verdict may be the halt of crimes.

it doesn't matter

variant of 咱[zan2]
it's not important/it's nothing/never mind/to have nothing to do/to be free/to be all right (out of danger or trouble)

(final particle similar to 了[le5], indicating that sth is obvious)
to have spare time/free from work/it's not important/it's nothing/never mind

otherwise/or else/how about...?/either... (or...)
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
